pending-transaction.title: Sending your tokens...
pending-transaction.description: Please wait for your tokens to complete sending.

failed-transaction.title: Something Went Wrong
failed-transaction.description: Your tokens were not sent to the new address. Please review what went wrong in the link below and try again.

long-transaction.title: Still Processing
long-transaction.description: Your send request is still processing. You may monitor your transaction using the link below, or try submitting a new transaction.
